widget.name: Context Menu
widget.description: Widget used to add a context menu to mendix content

property.caption: Close on click outside
property.description: Whether or not to close the context div when the user clicked anywhere else on the page.

property.caption: Close on click context
property.description: Whether or not to close the context div when the context div is clicked

property.caption: Is open attribute
property.description: Attribute where is stored whether the context div is open (true) or closed (false). Works two ways: widget will change this boolean when opened/closed or you can change this calue to open/close the context div. Make sure the user has write access.

property.caption: Show on top
property.description: Set to true to use default card styling and show on top of other content.

property.caption: Close button
property.description: Whether or not to show a close button in the right top.

property.caption: Show Where clicked
property.description: Set to true to open the context menu on the place you clicked

property.caption: Mendix content that can be right-clicked
On Open Action
property.description: Action to trigger when the context div is opened.

property.caption: On Close Action
property.description: Action to trigger when the context div is closed.
